## R-Pakete laden & Daten importieren

```{r}
#| message: false
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(gapminder)
```

## Daten erkunden 

```{r}
head(gapminder)
tail(gapminder)
glimpse(gapminder)
str(gapminder)
nrow(gapminder)
ncol(gapminder)
```

## Daten transformieren - Eingrenzen

```{r}
gapminder_2007 <- gapminder |> 
  filter(year == 2007)
```

-   Tastaturk端rzel f端r den Pipe-Operator: Ctrl / Cmd + Shift + M
-   Tastaturk端rzel f端r Zuweisungsoperator: Alt + -

## Daten visualisieren

```{r}
#| eval: true
ggplot(data = gapminder_2007,
       mapping = aes(x = continent,
                     y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
